name: Science Quest (Mateus)
description:
Fantasy game about albert einstein receiving a second chance in life so he try to solve differents kinds of puzzles and can finally finish his work about the string theory.

Controls

W A S D / ⬆️ ⬇️ ⬅️ ➡️ = Movement

X = Interaction

Tab = Pause

Left Mouse Button = Interaction

Credits

Music made by https://ecrettmusic.itch.io/ecrett-music
